meanings: [명사] (병으로 죽음) death from disease, [동사] die of an illness

vlive.korean: 병사들아 힘내고! Cheer up soldiers! 듣기 View video INFINITE : 보고싶었성규♥
병사들아 힘내라! Cheer up, soldiers! 듣기 View video INFINITE : 보고싶었성규♥
전역할 때까지 잘 지냈으면 좋겠습니다 병사들아 파이팅! so that you stay healthy till the day of your discharge. Cheer up! 듣기 View video INFINITE : 보고싶었성규♥
vlive.english: so that you stay healthy till the day of your discharge. Cheer up!

vlive.korean: 해방군 병사가 되고 싶었어요. I wanted to become a soldier in the Liberation Army. 듣기 View video NCT : 어린이💚어른이💚모여라
vlive.english: I wanted to become a soldier in the Liberation Army.

vlive.korean: 저의 첫 번째 꿈은 해방군 병사가 되는 거였어요. My first dream was to become a soldier in the Liberation Army. 듣기 View video NCT : 어린이💚어른이💚모여라
vlive.english: My first dream was to become a soldier in the Liberation Army.

examples.korean: The soldiers concerned were confined to barracks 듣기 Add to Wordbook 관련 병사들은 막사에 갇혀 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The soldiers concerned were confined to barracks Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: All the men now face court martial. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 병사들은 이제 모두 군법회의에 직면해 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: All the men now face court martial. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He was taken prisoner by rebel soldiers. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 반역을 일으킨 병사들의 포로가 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was taken prisoner by rebel soldiers. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The soldiers were authorized to shoot at will. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 병사들에게는 사살권이 부여되어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The soldiers were authorized to shoot at will. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They gathered soldiers to fight the invading army. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 침략군과 맞서 싸울 병사를 모집했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They gathered soldiers to fight the invading army. Add to Wordbook
